details.sectionContent: In this event participants will be taught how to make a Tesla coil

In this round two groups will compete against each other by revolving disc. This disc will give different number and that number will have question (Technical, general knowledge & aptitude). Winners will be qualified for next round.

It is a time based round. In this round qualifying participants will get 4 photos of different places and participants will take selfies at that place & submit it. Participants who take minimum time will be qualified for the final round.

In the final round, qualifying participants will be taught how to make a tesla coil wireless power transmission kit.
This will be a Take away Kit
